message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS 

This paper is about improving document retrieval effectiveness using passage-based information. The main focus is on learning-to-rank-based document retrieval methods that utilize an effective ranking of passages produced in response to the query. This topic falls under the sub-category of Information Retrieval (cs.IR). Additionally, the paper also utilizes natural language processing techniques and machine learning algorithms, which are relevant to sub-categories such as Computational Linguistics (cs.CL), Machine Learning (cs.LG), Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI), and Data Structures and Algorithms (cs.DS).
